response.original_title: The Beat: Live at the Roundhouse
response.overview: In 2017 The Beat teamed up with The Selecter to give fans a rare treat, hitting the road together for a number of co-headline shows. Originally a six-date tour, due to phenomenal demand they played nearly 40 dates together in 2017 selling over 40,000 tickets in the UK and Europe including a sold-out show at London’s iconic Roundhouse. Life-long friends, they are two of the main bands to come out of 2 Tone – a crucial musical and cultural movement which is still as relevant today as it washer 30 years ago.  1. Ranking Full Stop -  2. Too Nice To Talk To - 3. Hands off She's Mine -  4. Best Friend -  5. Side to Side -  6. Avoid the Obvious - 7. Click click - 8. Tears of a Clown - 9. Doors of Your Heart - 10. My Dream - 11. Fire Burn - 12. Can't Get used to Losing You - 13. Mirror in the Bathroom
response.title: The Beat: Live at the Roundhouse
